rev.desc.rev.desc: Deleted all references to the systemmonitor file - removed dbdict from SC 6.0+ canned system. Per previous fix, perf is now used instead of $sysmon. However the file variable was still being initialized and references remained for apparently no reason.
changed flow to use perf instead of $symon... perf now does the table creation as well as the output, and flags the systemtotals tables as capture, where it can be viewed with view.capture.

descript.descript: Deleted all references to the systemmonitor file - removed dbdict from SC 6.0+ canned system. Per previous fix, perf is now used instead of $sysmon. However the file variable was still being initialized and references remained for apparently no reason.
changed flow to use perf instead of $symon... perf no does the table creation as well as the output, and flags the systemtotals tables as capture, where it can be viewed with view.capture.
